message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds immense value, and I'm confident it can be a game-changer for you. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,800,000.  I'm open to discussing this further if you have any thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,500,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,700,000. This is my final offer, as I have other interested buyers.

Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,600,000. I hope this is within your range and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
